text:
Also, #colchicine (old drug for Gout), #Ivermectin #HydroxyChloroquine #Chloroquine - so, I see they're finally acknowledging the cheap old drugs, VERY few side effects, if any, to use for #Covid - gee, why now, and not March, I wonder? It's a thinker...
All those lives lost #smh https://t.co/eWiCNuXLNY
